java/liquibase/change/AddPrimaryKeyChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.AddPrimaryKeyStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00011 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class AddPrimaryKeyChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String schemaName;
00024     private String tableName;
00025     private String tablespace;
00026     private String columnNames;
00027     private String constraintName;
00028 
00029     public AddPrimaryKeyChange() {
00030         super("addPrimaryKey", "Add Primary Key");
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getTableName() {
00034         return tableName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00038         this.tableName = tableName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getSchemaName() {
00042         return schemaName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00046         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getColumnNames() {
00050         return columnNames;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public void setColumnNames(String columnNames) {
00054         this.columnNames = columnNames;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getConstraintName() {
00058         return constraintName;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00062         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00063     }
00064 
00065 
00066     public String getTablespace() {
00067         return tablespace;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00071         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00075         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00076 
00077         AddPrimaryKeyStatement statement = new AddPrimaryKeyStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnNames(), getConstraintName());
00078         statement.setTablespace(getTablespace());
00079 
00080         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00081             return new SqlStatement[]{
00082                     statement,
00083                     new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName())
00084             };
00085         }
00086 
00087         return new SqlStatement[]{
00088                 statement
00089         };
00090     }
00091 
00092     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00093         DropPrimaryKeyChange inverse = new DropPrimaryKeyChange();
00094         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00095         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00096         inverse.setConstraintName(getConstraintName());
00097 
00098         return new Change[]{
00099                 inverse,
00100         };
00101     }
00102 
00103     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00104         return "Primary key added to " + getTableName() + " (" + getColumnNames() + ")";
00105     }
00106 
00107     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00108         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00109         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00110             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00111         }
00112         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00113         node.setAttribute("columnNames", getColumnNames());
00114         if (getConstraintName() != null) {
00115             node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00116         }
00117         if (getTablespace() != null) {
00118             node.setAttribute("tablespace", getTablespace());
00119         }
00120 
00121         return node;
00122     }
00123 
00124     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00125 
00126         Set<DatabaseObject> dbObjects = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00127 
00128         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00129         dbObjects.add(table);
00130 
00131         for (String columnName : columnNames.split(",")) {
00132             Column column = new Column();
00133             column.setTable(table);
00134             column.setName(columnName.trim());
00135 
00136             dbObjects.add(column);
00137         }
00138 
00139         return dbObjects;
00140 
00141     }
00142 
00143 }
